source: Olofsson et al. 2014, Remote Sensing of Environment 148:42-57, Table 4 & Section 4.2
description: 4-class land cover map accuracy assessment. Matrix: reference=rows, classified=cols. Classes: 1=Deforestation, 2=Forest gain, 3=Stable forest, 4=Stable non-forest.
notes: Values approximate from paper. Used for structural validation, not exact decimal matching.
